headline: This week’s cover

children.data: Our worldwide cover looks at Joe Biden’s plan to remake America’s economy. It is confused and selfish, but could help save the planet.
Joe Biden’s effort to remake the economy is ambitious, risky—and selfish
America’s government is spending lavishly to revive manufacturing
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly

bodyText:
Our worldwide cover looks at Joe Biden’s plan to remake America’s economy. It is confused and selfish, but could help save the planet.

Leader: Joe Biden’s effort to remake the economy is ambitious, risky—and selfish
Briefing: America’s government is spending lavishly to revive manufacturing
United States: America needs a new environmentalism
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly Cover Story newsletter.

parts.headline: This week’s covers
parts.description: How we saw the world

parts.headline: This week’s cover
parts.description: How we saw the world

parts.headline: Joe Biden’s effort to remake the economy is ambitious, risky—and selfish
parts.description: But America’s plan to spend $2trn could help save the planet

parts.headline: Nagging questions over the Adani empire won’t go away
parts.description: A short-seller’s report raises uncomfortable questions for India’s policymakers, too

parts.headline: The Bank of Japan should stop defending its cap on bond yields
parts.description: “Yield-curve control” has left the central bank facing huge losses

parts.headline: Why the West’s oil sanctions on Russia are proving to be underwhelming
parts.description: Another embargo comes into force on February 5th. Manage your expectations

parts.headline: Peru needs an early election and outside support, not interference
parts.description: A self-serving Congress and some neighbouring countries are fanning the flames

parts.headline: Letters to the editor
parts.subheadline: On the North Sea, police reform, economics research, doctors, America’s civil war, classified documents
parts.description: A selection of correspondence

_metadata.articleBody:
Our worldwide cover looks at Joe Biden’s plan to remake America’s economy. It is confused and selfish, but could help save the planet.

Leader: Joe Biden’s effort to remake the economy is ambitious, risky—and selfish
Briefing: America’s government is spending lavishly to revive manufacturing
United States: America needs a new environmentalism
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly Cover Story newsletter.
